research.title: Our Research
research.description: Explore our cutting-edge research projects and discoveries that push the boundaries of knowledge in our field.

publications.title: Publications
publications.description: Access our latest publications, research papers, and contributions to the scientific community.

team.title: Team Members
team.description: Meet our dedicated team of researchers, graduate students, and collaborators driving innovation forward.

opportunities.title: Opportunities
opportunities.description: Discover opportunities to join our research team and contribute to groundbreaking scientific work.

welcome.title: Welcome to Our New Website
welcome.content: We're excited to launch our new laboratory website featuring our research, publications, and team information.

overview.title: Laboratory Overview
overview.content1: Professor Hsueh-Ting Chu's research laboratory is dedicated to advancing scientific knowledge through innovative research methodologies and collaborative approaches. Our lab focuses on cutting-edge research that addresses fundamental questions and practical challenges in our field.
overview.content2: We foster an environment of intellectual curiosity, rigorous scientific inquiry, and interdisciplinary collaboration. Our team is committed to producing high-quality research that contributes meaningfully to the scientific community and society at large.

philosophy.title: Research Philosophy
philosophy.intro: Our research approach is grounded in systematic investigation, innovative thinking, and collaborative problem-solving. We believe in:
points: Rigorous scientific methodology and reproducible research
Mentorship and professional development of emerging researchers
Translation of research findings into practical applications
Commitment to ethical research practices and social responsibility

mission.title: Laboratory Mission
mission.content: To conduct innovative research that advances scientific understanding, trains the next generation of researchers, and contributes to solving complex challenges facing our society. We strive to create an inclusive and supportive environment where diverse perspectives are valued and intellectual growth is nurtured.

facilities.title: Laboratory Facilities
facilities.content: Our laboratory is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities and instrumentation necessary for conducting high-quality research. We maintain modern equipment and continuously upgrade our capabilities to support innovative research projects and provide excellent training opportunities for our team members.

people.title: People
people.collaboratorsDescription: Our lab maintains active collaborations with researchers from various institutions around the world. These partnerships enable us to tackle complex research questions and leverage diverse expertise.

alumni.title: Alumni
alumni.description: Our laboratory has graduated talented researchers who have gone on to make significant contributions in their respective fields. We are proud of their achievements and maintain strong connections with our alumni community.

overview.title: Research Overview
overview.content: Our laboratory focuses on applying advanced AI models across diverse domains including computational biology, smart manufacturing, chip design, and FinTech. We are committed to continuously updating our technologies, particularly in the application of Large Language Models (LLM) and Vision-Language Models (VLM), to address complex cross-domain challenges and drive innovative developments.

areas.title: AI-driven Computational Biology
areas.description: Applying advanced LLM and VLM models for biological data analysis, including RNA-Seq analysis, genome sequencing, and genomic data processing to understand complex biological systems.
projects: LLM-enhanced RNA-Seq de novo assembly and analysis platform
AI-powered genomic variant detection and annotation
Deep learning for comparative genomics and evolutionary analysis
areas.funding: Funded by NSTC and MOST - Multiple grants

areas.title: Smart Manufacturing & Industry 4.0
areas.description: Utilizing AI models and machine learning techniques to improve manufacturing processes, including quality control, predictive maintenance, and production optimization.
projects: Computer vision for automated optical inspection
areas.funding: Industry partnerships and government smart manufacturing grants

areas.title: AI for Chip Design & EDA
areas.description: Applying advanced AI technologies to semiconductor design automation, enhancing chip design efficiency and performance optimization.
areas.funding: Semiconductor industry collaborations and research grants

areas.title: FinTech & Quantitative Trading
areas.description: Combining LLM and deep learning technologies to develop intelligent trading systems and financial risk management solutions.
projects: LLM agents for adaptive quantitative trading
Deep learning for risk assessment and management
areas.funding: FinTech industry partnerships and financial research grants

equipment.title: Laboratory Equipment
equipment.description: State-of-the-art instrumentation and equipment for conducting advanced AI and computational research.

computational.title: Computational Resources
computational.description: High-performance computing facilities for data analysis, machine learning model training, and simulation work.

tools.title: Specialized Tools
tools.description: Access to specialized software, databases, and analytical tools necessary for our research domains.

collaborations.title: Collaborations
collaborations.description: Our research benefits from active collaborations with leading researchers and institutions worldwide. These partnerships enable us to tackle complex challenges that require diverse expertise and resources.

academic.title: Academic Partnerships
academic.description: Collaborative projects with universities and research institutes globally, including active partnerships with Simon Fraser University (Canada) for bioinformatics and genomics research.

industry.title: Industry Connections
industry.description: Applied research partnerships with industry leaders to translate research into practice.

international.title: International Networks
international.description: Participation in international research consortiums and scientific networks.
